crown.name: CSK_DeviceNetworkConfig
crown.desc: This module provides the possibility to setup the ethernet interfaces of the device. + See following descriptions of events/functions regarding further information.

event.name: OnNewSubnetMask
event.desc: Notify current subnet mask.

event.name: OnNewIP
event.desc: Notify current IP.

event.name: OnNewInterfaceTable
event.desc: Notify interface table as JSON (e.g. for table in UI).

param.desc: Table of interfaces as a JSON string.
param.name: InterfaceTable

event.name: OnNewDHCPStatus
event.desc: Notify current DHCP status.

event.name: OnNewDefaultGateway
event.desc: Notify current 'Default Gateway'

event.name: OnIPDisabled
event.desc: Notified to disable / enable 'IP' text field in UI.

event.name: OnSubnetDisabled
event.desc: Notified to disable / enable 'Subnet mask' text field in UI.

event.name: OnGatewayDisabled
event.desc: Notified to disable / enable 'Gateway' text field in UI.

event.name: OnIPError
event.desc: Highlights the 'IP' in UI if format of IP is not correct.

event.name: OnSubnetError
event.desc: Highlights the 'Subnet' field in UI if format is not correct.

event.name: OnGatewayError
event.desc: Highlights the 'Gateway field' in UI if format of gateway is not correct.

event.name: OnApplyButtonDisabled
event.desc: Notified to disable / enable 'Apply new config' button in UI.

event.name: OnNewEthernetConfigStatus
event.desc: Notify current configuration process status.

event.name: OnDHCPDisabled
event.desc: Notified to disable / enable 'DHCP' checkbox in UI.

event.name: OnNewInterfaceChoice
event.desc: Notify currently selected interface.

event.name: OnUserLevelOperatorActive
event.desc: Status of Operator userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelMaintenanceActive
event.desc: Status of Maintenance userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelServiceActive
event.desc: Status of Service userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelAdminActive
event.desc: Status of Admin userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnNewPingResult
event.desc: Notify result of executed ping command.

event.name: OnNewPingDetails
event.desc: Notify details of executed ping command.

event.name: OnNewDNS
event.desc: Notify a new nameserver.

event.name: OnDataLoadedOnReboot
event.desc: Event to call if module tried to load parameters and should be ready.

event.name: OnNewStatusLoadParameterOnReboot
event.desc: Notify status if parameters should be loaded on app/device boot up.

event.name: OnNewParameterName
event.desc: Notify name of persistent data parameter.

function.name: setSubnetMask
function.desc: Preset subnet mask to be configured via 'applyConfig'.

function.name: setInterfaceIP
function.desc: Preset IP to be configured via 'applyConfig'.

function.name: setDHCPState
function.desc: Preset DHCP status to be configured via 'applyConfig'.

function.name: setDefaultGateway
function.desc: Preset default gateway to be configured via 'applyConfig'.

function.name: selectInterface
function.desc: Select ethernet interface via table in UI.

param.desc: The string with chosen row's content in JSON format.
param.name: row_selected

function.name: refresh
function.desc: Get current configuration of Ethernet ports.

function.name: applyConfig
function.desc: Apply preset network configuration to device when button in UI is pressed.

function.name: applyEthernetConfig
function.desc: Applies new configuration of Ethernet interface.

param.desc: Name of Ethernet interface to upload new configuration to, e.g. ETH1, ETH2 etc.
param.name: interfaceName

param.desc: New DHCP state. If true, then IP, subnet mask and gateway must be nil.
param.name: dhcpEnabled

param.desc: New IP addres. Must be nil if DHCP is on.
param.name: ipAddress

param.desc: New subnet mask. Must be nil if DHCP is on.
param.name: subnetMask

param.desc: New default gateway. Must be nil if DHCP is on.
param.name: gateway

function.name: getNetworkDescription
function.desc: Get current network description of device in JSON format.

function.name: ping
function.desc: Try to ping preset IP (see 'setPingIpAddress').

function.desc: Preset IP to ping (see 'ping' function).

param.name: selectedRow

function.desc: Add a new nameserver IP.

function.name: removeDNS
function.desc: Remove the selected nameserver IP.

function.desc: Load parameters for this module from the CSK_PersistentData module if possible and use them.
